none: 愛知県引馬神社の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Hikuma Shrine, Aichi (Original)

桜ヶ丘ミュージアムおよび引馬神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 版権所有・We would like to express our gratitude to Sakuragaoka Museum and Hikuma Shrine for giving us permission to photograph the sangaku and display them int he archive. All Rights Reserved
愛知県豊川市御津町御馬梅田3・3 Umeida, Omaba, Mitsu Town, Toyokawa City, Aichi Prefecture
渡辺統虎他21名・Watanabe Tōko and 21 others

県指定文化財
保管所：愛知県豊川市桜ケ丘町７９−２　桜ヶ丘ミュージアム・Prefecturally Designated Cultural Property  
Storage Location: 79-2 Sakuragaoka-cho, Toyokawa City, Aichi Prefecture, Sakuragaoka Museum
